MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text: The fext's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: hex 3/day each: counterspell, fear, gaseous form 1/day each: hold monster, true seeing

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The fext has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Weapons
MonsterTrait.Text: The fext's weapon attacks are magical.

MonsterTrait.Name: Patron Blessing
MonsterTrait.Text: A fext is infused with a portion of their patron's power. They have an Armor Class equal to 10 + their Charisma modifier + their Dexterity modifier.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The fext makes two melee or ranged attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Eldritch Blade
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6+2) slashing damage plus 16 (3d10) force damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Eldritch Fury
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 60/200 ft., one creature. Hit: 25 (4d10 + 3) force damage.
